peebee

A python package merging Galactic dynamics with direct acceleration measurements

Quick search

pdot_shk¶

peebee.convenience.pdot_shk(p, mu, d)¶

Compute , the change in observed period due to the Shklovskii Effect (See Shklovskii, 1970).

P:

(Orbital or spin) period (s)

Mu:

Total proper motion (mas/yr)

D:

Distance from Sun (kpc)
